name: deleteAPhoneNumberSLG
description:
Use this API to unassign a specific phone number that was assigned to the [shared line group](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360038850792-Setting-up-shared-line-groups). **Prerequisties:**
* Pro or higher account with Zoom Phone license. * A valid Shared Line Group * Account owner or admin privileges **Scopes:** `phone:write:admin` **[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `Light`

sharedLineGroupId.description: Unique identifier of the shared line group from which you would like to unassign a phone number.

phoneNumberId.description: Unique identifier of the phone number which is to be unassigned. This can be retrieved from Get a Shared Line Group API.
